700777f-c.text:
(1)
Clasons Point Amusement Park (Bronx): A view from Bronx River Avenue at White Plains Road. In the center, to the right of the tree, is the old Clasons Point Inn, dating back to pre-Revolutionary days.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(2)
The same from a different angle. The view is north, Stephens Avenue being on the right and Newman Avenue on the left.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(3) Another section of the amusement center. The view is south on the west side of Stephens Avenue, from Soundview Avenue. Note the old Inn at the end of the street.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr
700777f-c.folder: Bronx River Avenue & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
700777f-c.original_title: Bronx: Bronx River Avenue - White Plains Road
